generalQueryDis0: Hello! I am your Farming Helper. You can ask any question related to farming. Please write your question with full details so I can help you better. You can ask questions like.
generalQueryDis1: About diseases: Why are there yellow spots on the leaves of my wheat crop?
generalQueryDis2: About fertilizers: Which fertilizer should I use for a good yield in my potato crop?
generalQueryDis3: About market price: What is the market price of onions in the Mandi today?
generalQueryDis4: About weather: Is there a chance of rain in the next 3 days?
detectDiseaseDis0: To find out the disease in your crop, do this:
detectDiseaseDis2: Take a clear photo of the diseased part of the plant (leaf, stem, or fruit). Take the photo in sunlight and from up close.
detectDiseaseDis4: What is happening? (Example: The leaves are turning yellow and curling.)
detectDiseaseDis5: Since when is this happening? (Example: This has been happening for the last one week.)
detectDiseaseDis6: Have you used any medicine? (Example: I have not used any spray yet.)
